entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 18. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning then becoming light in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate.
